_comments.title: The main headline for the hero section. Can use '{businessName}' which will be replaced by the business name from the context.
_comments.subtitle: The paragraph below the main headline. Can also use '{businessName}'.
_comments.additionalText: An array of extra text lines to display below the subtitle. Each string is a new paragraph.
_comments.buttons: An array of buttons to display. 'text' is the button label. 'action' determines what it does ('scrollTo' for now). 'target' is the ID of the section to scroll to.
_comments.animation: Controls the Framer Motion animation timings. 'duration' is the base duration, and 'delayIncrement' is the time added between each animated element.
